entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h.
